stripped_text: Interrupt -> The first time you would do 1 or more net damage during each run on this server, instead you may pay 2 credits to do 1 brain damage. Errata from CR 1.4
text:
[interrupt] → The first time you would do 1 or more net damage during each run on this server, instead you may pay 2[credit] to do 1 brain damage.
<errata>Errata from CR 1.4</errata>
title: Tori Hanzō
